backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product, enquiry, feedback, message, and settings types with map-based storage plus access-control-protected profile and admin data operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files involved in admin unlock flow, backend authorization fixes, and React Query refresh behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, their purposes, and their roles in routing, queries, UI, and admin logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and applying base layout variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div, metadata, favicon, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes including guarded admin pages and wraps the app with theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button that clears admin session and query cache on logout and handles login edge cases.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to submit their name via backend save logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the app with top navigation, footer, floating WhatsApp button, and profile modal around routed content.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders a responsive navigation bar with links, logo, login button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Displays a floating WhatsApp contact button using site settings to build a prefilled chat link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Provides polling logic to detect when the authenticated actor is ready, with both hook and promise APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Tracks reactive admin session unlock state using a subscription to adminSession.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Handles admin auth checks, passkey verification, and user profile queries using the actor and admin session.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context for login, identity persistence, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching and mutation hooks for products, enquiries, messages, feedback, and site settings using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabbed panels for products, enquiries, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiriesP: Wrapper page that renders the admin enquiries panel.
Displays all enquiries with actions to confirm or reject them, including dialogs and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFeedbackPa: Fetches and lists customer feedback entries with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Provides the admin dashboard layout, navigation, and routing between admin pages with logout handling.
Handles admin passkey verification and redirects authenticated users to their intended admin route.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Shows all submitted contact messages with error, loading, and empty-state logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Wrapper component that renders the products management panel.
Allows admins to view products and add new ones through a form with file upload and validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRouteGuard: Protects admin routes by redirecting locked users to login and preserving the return path.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Renders the admin settings form, loads existing site settings, allows editing fields, parses pricing table text, and saves updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTwoStepAcc: Displays a passkey prompt for admin unlock, handles form submission, validation, and error display.
frontend/src/pages/AdvantagesPage.tsx: Displays a list of HDPE pipe advantages using cards and sets the page title.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form that submits messages via API and shows company contact info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with hero section, features, about info, and navigation CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/OrderEnquiryPage.tsx: Provides an order/enquiry form with validation, file upload, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product listings with details, availability, and optional certifications.
Lists various applications of HDPE pipes using card-style sections.
frontend/src/utils/adminCredentials.ts: Defines a static admin passkey and provides a function to verify a given passkey.
frontend/src/utils/adminReturnPath.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears the admin return path in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages the admin unlocked session flag, provides logout and clear functions, and dispatches session change events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing admin login issues, existing features, and required fixes related to admin session unlocking.
